mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (order_no, uid, addr_id, amount, type, freight, status, payment_time, delivery_time, finish_time, close_time, created, updated) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{uid}, #{addrId}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{freight}, #{status}, #{paymentTime}, #{deliveryTime}, #{finishTime}, #{closeTime}, #{created}, #{updated})
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_no AS orderNo, uid, addr_id, amount, type, freight, status, payment_time, delivery_time, finish_time, close_time, created, updated FROM orders WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY created DESC
